title: (x) School script like font - MeMimas {Karen}
content:
can anyone help identify this font? thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100518194214/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_3.jpg) | 58.67 KB |
author: jawslinden

comments.content:
It's [Little Days](http://web.archive.org/web/20100518194214/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/westwind/littledays_alt.htm) or [MeMima](http://web.archive.org/web/20100518194214/http:/www.type-o-tones.com/p_fonts/p_memi.htm), depending on whether or not you want to pay for it.

The UC T is different from Little Days though. But I can't find the char set for MeMima.

That's the cap T from [MeMima Regular,](http://web.archive.org/web/20100518194214/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=TO.6104.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=The+Times&sampleSize=48) alright.
